website_summaries.verdict: One of Puma’s most popular shoes becomes even more multi-faceted with the introduction of even more reflective materials and a water-repellent upper. The Puma Ignite Dual NightCat offers exceptional comfort, solid arch support, excellent cushioning, and the kind of flexibility that runners look for in a well-cushioned shoe. Additionally, the very reasonable price and the simple, yet elegant look only makes this shoe even more attractive to runners of different levels.
pros: The NightCat version of the Ignite Dual is very comfortable, according to many reviewers
The reflective details in this model gained positive remarks from consumers
A good number of heel strikers loved the cushioning in the heel
Runners commented that the water-repelling capability of the upper helped in keeping their feet dry
The underfoot platform’s flexibility received good feedback from testers
It is a value for the money purchase, based on the comments of some runners
Several purchasers were able to use the Puma Ignite Dual NightCat for cardio exercises and gym workouts with ease
Several runners received compliments about how cool they looked while wearing this shoe
The shoe helped in making the transition from landing to take-off very smooth, some testers observed
There were reviewers who reported that the Ignite Dual NightCat felt suitably lightweight
cons: A few forefoot strikers felt that the forefoot is just not cushioned enough for long runs
Some runners wanted a little padding in the tongue to prevent it from causing irritation

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe!! Amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!! First of all, I bought my first pair of Puma running shoes just a few mornths before these and I was blown away! I had bought these in a Men's Size 7 by accident and had to return for a Men's size 7.5 as I am a Women's size 9. They are the perfect size, fit, and great for running! I run outside not on treadmills so I cannot attest to how they feel on machines. These are so comfy and have a great inner sole integrity! You will not be disappoint just remember they are Men's shoes so you will have to go 1 - 1.5 sizes down!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V.

customer_reviews.title: Nike and Rebook can suck it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my cross trainers. They fit perfectly, comfortable, the soles are perfect weight lifting. Really LOVE the color puma offers. I previously purchased a pair in Electric lemonade, very happy with this brand. A quality atheltic shoe for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Luna

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for a nice running shoe that offers comfort then turn away from ...
customer_reviews.text: While the shoe fits well and to size, though just slightly small in width, these were VERY uncomfortable. You can actually feel everything you walk over. If your looking for a nice running shoe that offers comfort then turn away from this one.

customer_reviews.title: Seem to run 1/2 size small

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens Ignite Dual Nightcat-M Ignite Dual Nightcat
product_meta.description: With lowered midsole heights, articulated chevron design, and flex grooves in the forefoot, ignite dual Nightcat offers a combination of energy return and flexibility. Along with reflectivity for safety in low light conditions, the upper is equipped with a water repellant treatment that disperses water to keep the foot dry on every run.
feature_bullets: Our innovative upper fully protects against the elements. The mesh provides reflectivity while also repeling water to keep the foot dry in the toughest conditions.
